name: Anti-C++ C++ CLub
description:
C++ developer trapped in their own game! You must fight through the glitchy and unstable software to break out of the game! To do so, you will need to shoot down enemies, manage ammo and lives, and have fun! 

Made using scratch for the Monthly Scratch Jam #1. 

Some art assets used were provided by Zapsplat, and some sounds were from Pixabay.
